ygData.subject: Re: Murissa Sandwhisper (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry ,, just to explain better ,,, if you go derv hunting ,,  then you make an enemy of murissa ,,,  she does have a faction ,,, the derv faction ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
sorry ,, just to explain better ,,, if you go derv hunting ,, then you make
an enemy of murissa ,,, she does have a faction ,,, the derv faction

----- Original Message -----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 3:00 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Murissa Sandwhisper (spoiler)


> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Thu, 17 Jun 1999, Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn wrote:
> >
> > I had the misfortune to get killed by Murissa Sandwhisper the other day.
I
> > was not aware that she would attack someone unprovoked. I was in North
Ro
>
> She was not unprovoked. :-)
>
> Spoiler spacing for those who wish to try to figure out on
> their own why Murissa kills them.
>
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
>
> > I now know to avoid her. However, one day I will get my revenge. Does
> > anyone know if she is part of a quest? Also, when I do get my revenge,
is
> > there a major faction hit with anyone in Freeport?
>
> I'm pretty sure she is aligned with the cutthroat dervishes.
> Yes, all those messages you ignored saying "Your faction with
> the Cutthroat Dervishes got worse" has a consequence. :-)
>
> I'm still trying to figure out what the faction connection is
> with the merchant in the first building on the right as you
> enter East Commonlands from Freeport. She stopped selling to
> me long before I ever met dervishes.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
